name: Baby Dragon Run Free
description:
** 100% FREE! EVERYTHING UNLOCKED! **
** EASY TO PLAY! HOURS OF FUN! **

Get ready for the cutest little running game you've every played. Baby Dragon Run is a fun running game where you control a baby dragon as he makes his way through a strange new world.

FEATURES

- Real cute adorable baby dragons.
- Easy game play.
- Fun music.
- Game Center.

> PRIVACY POLICY <

Privacy is an issue that we take very seriously. For more info, please see our privacy policy at www.juuq.com/privacy-policy
